name: Goji Berries
properties: Better choice than raisins for weight loss
benefits: Goji berries are recommended as a weight-loss-optimized alternative to raisins. They activate AMPK, which helps boost cellular metabolism and fat burning. Their anti-inflammatory properties and nutrient density make them an excellent breakfast addition.
amount: Use as dried fruit alternative in breakfast dishes

quotes: If we did want to use dried, as we learned in the Amping AMPK and Inflammation Quenchers sections, barberries or gojis might be a better choice.
